arts.ttl: Report: Chelsea star is placed at the top of the list of Real Madrid transfer targets
arts.sum: Real Madrid are planning for their next era of domination and they have identified that their defensive position needs to be strengthened. Los Blancos have planned to sign a new right-back, left-back and centre-back in a major overhaul of their defense. According to HITC, they have placed Chelsea right-back Reece James towards the top of […] The post Report: Chelsea star is placed at the top of the list of Real Madrid transfer targets appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Arsenal news: Real Madrid plot William Saliba transfer as £34m star suffers injury
arts.sum: William Saliba has been among Arsenal's best players over the past three seasons but now Real Madrid are plotting an ambitious transfer move for the French centre-back

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Real Madrid 3 - 1 Stuttgart; 2024 UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Antonio Rüdiger—8: Scored the go-ahead goal to make it 2-1 in the 83rd minute off a header from a Luka Modric corner. Kylian Mbappé—7: Scored his fifth goal in seven matches and his first goal for Real Madrid in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Endrick becomes youngest Madridista to score in European Cup history
arts.sum: After, Endrick said: “I'm very happy with my debut and my first goal in the Champions League in my career. By scoring against Stuttgart at the Santiago Bernabéu, Endrick made history by becoming the youngest-ever Madridista to find the back of the net in the European Cup .
Santiago Bernabéu : “It's important to win in this shirt and even more so in the Champions League . It went well, we got the win and now we have to keep improving.”

arts.ttl: Rodri gives verdict on Real Madrid transfer speculation
arts.sum: Rodri remains under contract until 2027 and City feel under no pressure in regards to his future. Rodri has insisted he remains solely focused on Manchester City in the face of mounting rumours of interest from Real Madrid.

arts.ttl: Endrick showed 'courage' on 1st Madrid UCL goal
arts.sum: Carlo Ancelotti said Endrick "has balls" after the Real Madrid forward, 18, scored his first Champions League goal from distance -- despite having Vinicius Junior and Kylian Mbappé as passing options.

arts.ttl: Ancelotti: “Thibaut Courtois is the best goalkeeper in the world right now”
arts.sum: Real Madrid coach Carlo Ancelotti spoke to the media after the team’s 3-1 win over Stuttgart on Tuesday in the Champions League, where he talked about Thibaut Courtois’ greatness, about which he said: “I can make a list [of great goalkeepers I have coached]. I have coached more than two hundred Champions League matches and I do not remember not suffering, ever...”

arts.ttl: ‘He has balls’ – Carlo Ancelotti hails Real Madrid youngster after win over Stuttgart
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti has late on Tuesday moved to praise an up-and-coming member of his side’s frontline. This comes owing to his efforts in Real’s latest outing.…

arts.ttl: Sebastian Hoeness: Stuttgart "can be proud" despite loss to Real Madrid
arts.sum: Sebastian Hoeness was proud of his Stuttgart side despite coming away empty-handed against Real Madrid.
